oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The people fear the rain's animals because they are things the rain has put aside for its meat. They are the cobra, the puffadder, the tortoise and the great water tortoise. 1) See also Rain protects frogs, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-16.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rain's animals
